pullrequest.title: Add tutorials for hardware / simulation bridging (#337)

content.raw:
The first option doesn't work when the controller is paused (for example, breakpoints during debugging) or when anything else is going on on the computer, preempting either the simulation or the controller. This makes it possible for the controller to fail at undetermined times. 

On the real robot, using a realtime OS, this is usually avoided. However, usually nothing else is going on that computer.
